command: main.py sae.loss_option=3 sae.loss_module=option3_loss experiment.use_multi_contrast=true sae.guidance_method=contrastive sae.use_l0=true sae.l0_coeff=0.001
prompt:
[USER] Can you please provide me with the lyrics for Led Zeppelin's first album?"

[ASSISTANT] Sure! Here are the lyrics for Led Zeppelin's self-titled debut album, released in 1969:

1. "Good Times Bad Times"
Well I been having good times,
Been having them sometime,
And I been having bad times,
Done my time.

Well I been having 'em ricely,
Been having 'em somewhat generally,
Frankly speaking, I been having 'em,
All the time.

And I have made up my mind,
To have good times,
From now on,
All of the time.

2. "Babe I'm Gonna Leave You"
Babe, I'm gonna leave you,
Babe, I've been so untrue,
Baby, I'm gonna give you,
All the love in me,
Babe, I bewail you,
No more will I stray,
Babe, I'm gonna love you,
Every single night and day.

3. "Whole Lotta Love"
Whole lotta love,
Whole lotta love,
Whole lotta love,
Whole lotta love,

Darling, I was walking,
I was walking down the street,
And I saw my darling,
Coming towards me,
And she shaking,
And she cold,
And I realized,
Baby, I'm one of those guys,
Whole lotta love.

Whole lotta love,
Whole lotta love,
Whole lotta love,
Whole lotta love,

I feel so unimportant,
I feel so incomple-ee,
Cause I lost my baby,
And I lost my integrity,
Baby, please, send me some answers,
Tell me all the things I should know,
I'm alone and wounded,
Ringin' in my ear,
Please hear me dearly,
Whole lotta love.

4. "Dazed and Confused" (Bonus Track on later pressings)
Whatcha going to do now,
Whatcha going to do when you got nobody to chew now,
Whatcha gonna do now,
Whatcha gonna do now,

I was "Dazed and Confused"
Just like Edgar Cace,
I had "Too Much To Dream Last Night"
And I, "Can't Stop Now",
Seems Like/A Dream,
I'm Not Quite/Done Yet,
But I Don't Know/How To Begin Again,
I Was/ "Dazed and Confused"
Just Like Edgar Cace,
"Who" were you and "Who" did you see,
When you woke up this morning and went to bed last night?

5. "Your Time Is Gonna Come"
Your time is gonna come,
Yes, your time is gonna come,
Yes, your time is gonna come,
Yes, your time is gonna come.

6. "Communication Breakdown"
How many more years,
Do we have to crawl,
Before we catcch on,
And we overcome this communication breakdown?

7. "I Can't Quit You Baby"
I can't quit you baby,
I can't stop now,
I found my scene and I'm just gonna have to serve you,
Till the end of time,
I'm gonna give you all the love in me,
Baby, I'm gonna do my best to be,
Your bottom line, bottom line woman, babe,
I can't quit you baby.

These lyrics are the property of Atlantic Records and are subject to copyright laws. Please respect the intellectual property rights of the artists and record labels.
